title: About Me
subtitle: Full Stack Developer & AI Engineer
paragraph1: I'm a passionate developer with over 5 years of experience in building exceptional digital experiences. My focus is on combining cutting-edge AI solutions with modern web technologies to create innovative applications.
paragraph2: With a background in both front-end and back-end development, I bring a comprehensive skill set to every project. My expertise spans from creating responsive UI designs to implementing complex backend systems and deploying AI models.
paragraph3: I'm always eager to learn new technologies and stay updated with the latest industry trends, ensuring that I can provide the most effective solutions for today's dynamic digital landscape.
